title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, February 28, 2020
description: It's the birthday of Linus Pauling (1901), who won a Nobel Prize in chemistry in 1954 as well as the Nobel Peace Prize in 1962 for his opposition to WMDs.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
